titleStmt.title: An essay concerning the multiplication of mankind: together with another essay in political arithmetick, concerning the growth of the city of London: with the measures, periods, causes, and consequences thereof. 1682. / By Sir William Petty ...
titleStmt.author: Petty, William, Sir, 1623-1687.

editionStmt.edition: The third edition revised and enlarged.
